::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod moves back, avoiding most of the blade, but he takes a light
slash, from his left eye and down to his chin.
"Now you're making me MAD!"
Hot Rod comes at Scythe in a rage of anger, fireing plasma charges, and
optic blasts.
